item.title: Lizards & Rock, Paper, Scissors: Agent-based modelling
item.description: Rock, paper, scissors Side Blotched Lizards Agent-based modeling This article was inspired by this post, which I attempted to recreate and extend. If you want to see the full code for this post then you can find the .Rmd file here. Rock, paper, scissors Aim: Simulate simple rock, paper, scissors game to visualise a simple evolutionary process. Simple Game Rules: Individuals are organised on a lattice network.
